title: [Silvergate, Courtyard]
description: A magnificent grey stone manor rises before you.  Thick arrays of ivy climb the ancient walls and frame a set of arched doors leading into the manor itself.  Flanking the main building, twin towers rise gracefully, providing a striking balance and harmony to the view.

A magnificent grey stone manor rises before you.  Thick arrays of ivy climb the ancient walls and frame a set of elegantly arched doors leading into the manor itself.  Flanking the main building, twin towers rise gracefully, providing a striking balance and harmony to the view.

A magnificent grey stone manor with a crested cornerstone rises into view, light dancing in its windows.  Thick arrays of ivy climb the ancient walls, framing an elegant bronze plaque and a set of tall arched doors.  Flanking the main building, twin towers rise gracefully, providing a striking balance and harmony to the view.  Cushioned silver benches are scattered about the paved courtyard in pools of light shed by wrought iron lamposts.  A high stone wall with an ornate silver gate circles the property.
